name: Mount Roller Dispatch
description:
Prototype Submission to Ubisoft's 2023's Gamelab under the theme arcade!

Skate as fast as possible to deliver packages across two upside down cities. Create ramps and destroy obstacles to help you navigate and race against the clock!

Inspired by 1970s arcade, Montreal, and roller-skating, the aim of the game is to find the best way to reach deliveries and try to beat yours or other people's scores!
